name: China Acrobatics Show And Charming Shanghai Evening Bus Group Night Tour
description: China acrobatics show has a long history, which can be traced back to Neolithic times. Acrobatics came from people’s labor and self-defense skills. As the world economy developed, acrobatics was developed into a kind of performance art. Acrobatics became well-known worldwide performing arts. Pick travelers from hotels at 18:30-19:00.The show lasts about one and half hours.
